timeline.bodyText: Will there be a single bucket for data coming from prod and a separate bucket for data coming from opensbx?  Or will all data flow into one bucket?
timeline.author: msnook

replies.bodyText:
We can have a separate Kinesis Firehose Datastream for each environment but the data will all go in the same bucket. The buckets are only distinguished by sensitivity:

high: Contains information which are highly sensitive. PII data has high sensitivity.
moderate: Contains data which are moderately sensitive. DASG logs have moderate sensitivity. Logs are scrubbed not to contain high sensitivity data.
replies.author: orenfromberg
